description: meta info used by the elastic parser, all names are expected to start with x_elastic

metaInfos.description: Order of the elastic constant
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_elastic_constant_order

metaInfos.description: contains the values computed during a calculation performed on a given configuration of the system
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_section_single_configuration_calculation

metaInfos.description: number of deformed structures equally spaced in strain, which are generated between the maximum negative strain and the maximum positive one
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_number_of_deformations

metaInfos.description: Values of the strain for which the energy is calculated
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_energy_strain_eta_values

metaInfos.description: energy values as a function of the strain
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_energy_strain_energy_values

metaInfos.description: Second order polinomial fit of the derivative of the energy with respect to the lagrangian stress
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_d2E_d2E_values_2nd

metaInfos.description: Fourth order polinomial fit of the derivative of the energy with respect to the lagrangian stress
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_d2E_d2E_values_4th

metaInfos.description: Sixth order polinomial fit of the derivative of the energy with respect to the lagrangian stress
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_d2E_d2E_values_6th

metaInfos.description: Strain values of the second order polinomial fit of the derivative of the energy with respect to the lagrangian stress
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_d2E_eta_values_2nd

metaInfos.description: Strain values of the fourth order polinomial fit of the derivative of the energy with respect to the lagrangian stress
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_d2E_eta_values_4th

metaInfos.description: Strain values of the sixth order polinomial fit of the derivative of the energy with respect to the lagrangian stress
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_d2E_eta_values_6th

metaInfos.description: Cross-validation error for the second order polinomial fit of the derivative of the energy with respect to the lagrangian stress
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_cross_cross_values_2nd

metaInfos.description: Cross-validation error for the fourth order polinomial fit of the derivative of the energy with respect to the lagrangian stress
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_cross_cross_values_4th

metaInfos.description: Cross-validation error for the sixth order polinomial fit of the derivative of the energy with respect to the lagrangian stress
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_cross_cross_values_6th

metaInfos.description: Strain values for the cross-validation error of the second order polinomial fit of the derivative of the energy with respect to the lagrangian stress
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_cross_eta_values_2nd

metaInfos.description: Strain values for the cross-validation error of the fourth order polinomial fit of the derivative of the energy with respect to the lagrangian stress
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_cross_eta_values_4th

metaInfos.description: Strain values for the cross-validation error of the sixth order polinomial fit of the derivative of the energy with respect to the lagrangian stress
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_cross_eta_values_6th

metaInfos.name: x_elastic_d2E_number_of_eta_polinomial_4th

metaInfos.name: x_elastic_d2E_number_of_eta_polinomial_2nd

metaInfos.description: Number of strain values used for the cross validation of the sixth order polinomial fit of the derivative of the energy with respect to the lagrangian stress
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_cross_number_of_eta_polinomial_6th

metaInfos.name: x_elastic_cross_number_of_eta_polinomial_4th

metaInfos.name: x_elastic_2nd_order_constants_notation_matrix

metaInfos.name: x_elastic_2nd_order_constants_matrix

metaInfos.name: x_elastic_3rd_order_constants_matrix

metaInfos.description: Elastic compliance matrix in 1/GPa
metaInfos.name: x_elastic_2nd_order_constants_compliance_matrix

metaInfos.name: x_elastic_eigenvalues

metaInfos.name: x_elastic_deformation_types

metaInfos.name: x_elastic_calculation_method

metaInfos.name: x_elastic_code

metaInfos.name: x_elastic_space_group_number
